StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDataSheetDataByOrgIdYear]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@orgUnitId int, @.scalYear int
AS BEGIN
DECLARE @DataTable TABLE ( tv int default 0, radio int default 0, newspaper int default 0, billboard int default 0, TolPopula.on int default 0, TolRecruiters int default 0, MajEthnicGrp varchar(500) Null, MiscData varchar(500) Null, RssDataSheetId uniqueidentifier Null)
declare @fyst varchar(20) declare @fyed varchar(20)
declare @DTfyst date.me declare @DTfyed date.me
select @fyst = str(@.scalYear -1) + '/10/1' select @DTfyst = convert(date.me, @fyst,101)
--print @DTfyst
SELECT @fyed = str(@.scalYear) + '/9/30' SELECT @DTfyed = convert(date.me, @fyed,101)
INSERT INTO @DataTable ( tv, radio, newspaper, billboard, TolPopula.on, MajEthnicGrp,MiscData, RssDataSheetId )
SELECT mediarst.Tv, mediarst.radio, mediarst.newspaper, mediarst.billboard, rds.TolPopula.on, rds.MajEthnicGrp, rds.MiscData, RssDataSheetId FROM (SELECT count(mt1.MediaTypeId) tv, count(mt2.MediaTypeId) radio, count(mt3.MediaTypeId) newspaper, count(mt4.MediaTypeId) billboard FROM USMC.MapsSector ms INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on org on ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = org.rowguid INNER JOIN USMC.MapsSectorZip mz on mz.SectorId = ms.SectorId and mz.E.ec.veDate <@DTfyed and org.Organiza.on_Id = @orgUnitId INNER JOIN USMC.MediaCard mc on mc.Zip_code = mz.Zip and mc.FY = @.scalYear LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.MediaType mt1 on mc.MediaTypeId = mt1.MediaTypeId and mt1.MediaType='TV' LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.MediaType mt2 on mc.MediaTypeId = mt2.MediaTypeId and mt2.MediaType='Radio' LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.MediaType mt3 on mc.MediaTypeId = mt3.MediaTypeId and mt3.MediaType='Newspaper' LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.MediaType mt4 on mc.MediaTypeId = mt4.MediaTypeId and mt4.MediaType='Billboard' ) mediarst LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.RssDataSheet rds on rds.RssOrgId = @orgUnitId and rds.FysicalYear = @.scalYear
--update @DataTable set TolRecruiters = (select count(rowguid) from USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson rp --where rp.organiza.on_id = @orgUnitId and on_produc.on='Y')
UPDATE @DataTable SET TolRecruiters = (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ms.SectorID) FROM USMC.MapsSector ms INNER JOIN USMC.MapsSectorZip msz ON ms.SectorID = msz.SectorID INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on ro ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = ro.rowguid WHERE ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = @orgUnitId )
select * from @DataTable END
